articles.author: Justine Calma
articles.title: More than 130 companies including Ikea, Volvo ask world leaders to “phase out” fossil fuels - The Verge
articles.description: Volvo Cars, Ikea, Unilever, and Nestlé are among more than 130 companies that published a joint letter calling on governments to “phase out” fossil fuels ahead of international climate talks.
articles.content:
More than 130 companies including Ikea, Volvo ask world leaders to phase out fossil fuels
